recommendations.summary: The current system metrics indicate a stable environment with no detected security issues or compliance flags, but there is a need for proactive governance in data quality and cost optimization.

recommendations.title: Regular Security Audits
recommendations.description: Conduct regular security audits to ensure that the system remains secure and to identify any potential vulnerabilities proactively.
action_items: Schedule quarterly security audits with a third-party vendor.
Implement a continuous monitoring solution for real-time threat detection.

recommendations.title: GDPR/CCPA Compliance Review
recommendations.description: Perform a comprehensive review of data handling practices to ensure compliance with GDPR and CCPA regulations, even in the absence of current flags.
action_items: Review data collection and processing practices against GDPR/CCPA requirements.
Update privacy policies and user consent mechanisms as necessary.

recommendations.title: Cost Analysis of Job Execution
recommendations.description: Analyze the cost trends of the last 100 jobs to identify areas for cost optimization and efficiency improvements.
action_items: Conduct a detailed cost analysis to identify the most expensive jobs.
Optimize job configurations and resource allocations to reduce costs.

recommendations.title: Establish Data Quality Metrics
recommendations.description: Implement data quality metrics to monitor and improve the quality of data being processed by the platform.
action_items: Define key data quality metrics such as accuracy, completeness, and consistency.
Implement automated data validation checks to ensure data quality standards are met.

recommendations.title: Define and Monitor SLOs
recommendations.description: Establish Service Level Objectives (SLOs) to ensure performance standards are met and monitored regularly.
action_items: Define clear SLOs for system performance and availability.
Implement monitoring tools to track SLO adherence and generate reports.

alerts.message: No security issues detected, but regular audits are recommended to maintain security posture.
Data quality metrics are currently undefined; establishing them is crucial for effective governance.
